info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 6 days ago,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: We stayed at Rashedul bhai’s place for a pretty long time, and it went off without a hitch. The caretaker Robi bhai was always there for us to help us with anything we may need and always kept the flat pristine clean. I’d definitely recommend others to stay here!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I came to Dhaka for my mother's treatment and stayed here for about 10 days. The house was very good. Rabi and Manotosh are very helpful. All facilities, security system, everything is very good. I felt like home here. We had no problems.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Mohammad is an excellent and very responsive host. The place is.large, comfortable, two bedrooms and two bathrooms. Firm beds. Everything in working order. It's a good neighborhood if you want to see how locals live, but not the most convenient neighborhood for exploring the city. If you're looking for value though it can't be beat, the price is definitely right for the place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
I booked this place from UK just few days before travelling to Dhaka. Booking was very easy and host communicated well. The place was as described and photos look the same.
it has working good water filter, so no need to worry about clean drinking water. Full working kitchen and washing machine.
lift is very good. Rooms are very clean and tidy.
it's not very far from big private hospital at Dhanmondi like LabAid, Popular etc.
Locally restaurants available, whom you can contact and they can deliver warm food.
Aircon working well and when you close the windows it becomes so peaceful and almost no noise came from outside.
Hot water, Microwave & Freeze worked well.
it has CCTV outside the door and downstairs and 24/7 guards and caretaker available. So no problem with security at all.
I recommend this place to all. Hope you will also have a nice time here.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Great location. Nice minimal apartment near dhanmondi. Housekeeper and guards are very friendly. Kept the place clean. Will consider staying here again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: It is a beautiful place to stay in Dhaka. We stayed there for around 35 days. The host is a very helpful and cooperative to solve any problems in the apartment. It is a bit difficult to locate the exact location for Uber and Rikshaw at the beginning, but it will be solved if we use the location of the school nearby. We had a very pleasant and safe stay there. Robi, a helping guy is also very nice. I would definitely recommend everyone! 😃
